mapper.select: select /* DisplayCommonMapper.xml, getMenuItemList, SAC : 정희원 , 2014-01-24 */ MC.MENU_ID, MC.MENU_DEPTH, decode(MC.INFR_MENU_YN, 'Y', 1, 0) as IS_INFR_MENU, MC.UP_MENU_ID, MC.TOP_MENU_ID, MD.MENU_NM, MD.MENU_DESC from TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY MC inner join TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_DESC MD on MC.MENU_ID = MD.MENU_ID and MD.LANG_CD = #{langCd} and MC.USE_YN = 'Y' start with MC.MENU_ID in (select MP.MENU_ID from TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG MP where MP.PROD_ID=#{prodId} AND MP.USE_YN = 'Y') connect by prior MC.up_menu_id = MC.MENU_ID
SELECT CD_ID FROM TB_CM_CD WHERE (ADD_FIELD_01 =#{pixel1} OR ADD_FIELD_02=#{pixel1}) AND (ADD_FIELD_01 =#{pixel2} OR ADD_FIELD_02=#{pixel2})

SELECT /* DisplayCommonMapper.getSupportDeviceInfo, 단말 지원정보 조회, 이태희/부르칸, 2014-04-01 */ NVL(EBOOK_SPRT_YN, 'N') AS EBOOK_SPRT_YN , NVL(COMIC_SPRT_YN, 'N') AS COMIC_SPRT_YN , NVL(MUSIC_SPRT_YN, 'N') AS MUSIC_SPRT_YN , NVL(VIDEO_DRM_SPRT_YN, 'N') AS VIDEO_DRM_SPRT_YN , NVL(SD_VIDEO_SPRT_YN, 'N') AS SD_VIDEO_SPRT_YN , NVL(SCL_SHPG_SPRT_YN, 'N') AS SCL_SHPG_SPRT_YN , NVL(VOD_FIXISTT_SPRT_YN, 'N') AS VOD_FIXISTT_SPRT_YN FROM TB_CM_DEVICE WHERE DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT /* DisplayCommonMapper.xml, getUpdateList, SAC : 정희원 , 2014-01-24 */ * FROM ( SELECT PROD_UPD_DT, UPDT_TEXT FROM TB_DP_PROD_UPDT_HIS WHERE PROD_ID = #{channelId} ORDER BY PROD_UPD_DT DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd}
SELECT /* DisplayCommonMapper.xml, getUpdateCount, SAC : 정희원 , 2014-05-01 */ COUNT(*) AS HIST_CNT FROM TB_DP_PROD_UPDT_HIS WHERE PROD_ID = #{channelId}

SELECT /* DisplayCommonMapper.xml, selectProductTypeInfo, SAC : 정희원 , 2014-07-08 */ P.PROD_ID, P.SVC_GRP_CD, P.SVC_TYPE_CD, P.META_CLSF_CD, P.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD, P.TOP_MENU_ID, APP.PART_PARENT_CLSF_CD FROM TB_DP_PROD P LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_DP_APP_PROD APP ON APP.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID WHERE 1=1 AND P.PROD_ID = #{prodId}

select TDMC.MENU_ID AS MENU_ID, TDMCD.LANG_CD AS LANG_CD, MENU_NM, MENU_DESC from TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY TDMC INNER JOIN TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_DESC TDMCD ON TDMCD.MENU_ID = TDMC.MENU_ID WHERE 1=1 AND TDMC.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY TDMC.MENU_DEPTH, TDMC.MENU_ID
